page.title: 04Tracy Park
page.content: Tracy Park is an average sized Country Club in Wick. It has on its ground an 18 hole golf course, soon to be extended to 27 holes, 3 croquet lawns, 2 tennis courts, 1 outdoor swimming pool, 3 squash courts, 2 snooker, a bar, a restuarant and a conference room. On a normal day employed at the club are 6 green keepers, 3 chefs, 4 bar staff, 2 cleaners, 1 golf secretary, 1 typist, 4 managers, 3 shop assistants in the pro _ shop and 2 handy men. There are 550 Golf Members, 140 squash members and 400 social members at the Club. Also at Tracy Park they cater for wedding receptions and business conferences to do with Golfing societies. For the future there are plans for a 50 bedroom hotel and possibly an indoor pool.
